item.title: Gitlab CI & Kaniko to build Docker Images
item.description: Introduction You can build container images from a Dockerfile inside a container or a Kubernetes cluster, though JÃ©rÃ´me Petazzoni strongly discourages doing so. He wrote a detailed blog that can be read here on why not to build container images using Dockerfile inside a container or a Kubernetes cluster. Context You will get N number of blogs on how to use the CI/CD of GitLab; here we will see an easy reference point to extend a file and create CI/CD for Docker Image to be built and stored in the same GitLab registry using kaniko.
